Text:
Everybody who says "omg you're getting it for free so who cares if it doesn't work!" - That is the same as someone giving you a brand new $400 iPhone and saying "oh but wait, the battery doesn't work, the screen is smashed and the CPU is gone, but it's free!!"

That's stupid. If it doesn't work, don't fucking give it to me! This is a broken piece of shit.

The last several uploads by .Dude. have all been trash so don't hold your breath on his releases.
